mapper.select: select gradeid gradeId,NAME gradeName, GRADELEVEL gradeLevel , DISCOUNT_RATE discountRate from GRADE order by DISCOUNT_RATE
mapper.insert: insert into grade(gradeid, name, gradelevel, discount_rate, min_price, max_price, info) values(#{gradeId}, #{gradeName}, #{level}, #{discountRate}, #{minPrice}, #{maxPrice}, #{gradeInfo})
mapper.update: update grade set name=#{gradeName}, gradelevel=#{level}, discount_rate =#{discountRate}, min_price=#{minPrice}, max_price=#{maxPrice}, info=#{gradeInfo} where gradeid = '${gradeId}'
update grade set NAME=#{gradeName} where GRADEID =#{gradeId}
